Name: Provision of sick time earned by employees.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York in relation to the provision of sick time earned by employees.
BodyName: Committee on Civil Service and Labor
Summary: This local law would allow employees to use hour accrued under the Earned Sick Time Act in order to donate organs.
Text:
Int. No. 797

By Council Members Constantinides, Miller, Johnson, Chin and Rose 

..Title
A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York in relation to the provision of sick time earned by employees.
..Body

Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

      Section 1. Paragraphs 1 and 2 of subdivision a of section 20-914 of the administrative code of the city of New York, as added by local law number 46 for the year 2013, is amended to read as follows:
      1. such employee's mental or physical illness, injury or health condition or need for medical diagnosis, care or treatment of a mental or physical illness, injury or health condition, [or] need for preventive medical care, or in order to donate a bodily organ; or
      2. care of a family member who needs medical diagnosis, care or treatment of a mental or physical illness, injury or health condition, [or] need for preventive medical care, or in order to donate a bodily organ; or
      ï¿½ 2. This local law shall take effect immediately upon enactment into law.
